md:
giải nghĩa từ "steady" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* steady (adjective)
	+ Meaning: firm, stable, and not changing suddenly
	+ Example: "She has a steady hand when it comes to surgery."
	+ Related words: stable, firm, constant, unchanging

* steady (verb)
	+ Meaning: to make something or someone firm and stable
	+ Example: "He had to steady himself against the wall to avoid falling."
	+ Related words: stabilize, balance, support, hold

* steady (adverb)
	+ Meaning: in a steady and consistent manner
	+ Example: "The company has been growing steadily over the past few years."
	+ Related words: consistently, steadily, uniformly, regularly
html:
giải nghĩa từ "steady" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • steady (adjective)

    • Meaning: firm, stable, and not changing suddenly
    • Example: "She has a steady hand when it comes to surgery."
    • Related words: stable, firm, constant, unchanging

  • steady (verb)

    • Meaning: to make something or someone firm and stable
    • Example: "He had to steady himself against the wall to avoid falling."
    • Related words: stabilize, balance, support, hold

  • steady (adverb)

    • Meaning: in a steady and consistent manner
    • Example: "The company has been growing steadily over the past few years."
    • Related words: consistently, steadily, uniformly, regularly
